channel.title: CVE Feed for Red Lion Europe -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Red Lion Europe -- all products

item.title: CVE-2023-4834|2024-09-16T18:17:07.881Z -- red%20lion%20europe -- mbconnect24
item.description: In Red Lion Europe mbCONNECT24 and mymbCONNECT24 and Helmholz myREX24 and myREX24.virtual up to and including 2.14.2 an improperly implemented access validation allows an authenticated, low privileged attacker to gain read access to limited, non-critical device information in his account he should not have access to.

item.title: CVE-2024-5672|2024-08-01T21:18:06.930Z -- red%20lion%20europe -- mbnet.mini
item.description: A high privileged remote attacker can execute arbitrary system commands via GET requests due to improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command.

item.description: A high privileged remote attacker can execute arbitrary system commands via GET requests due to improper neutralization of special elements used in an OS command.
